title: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party!
description: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party!, also known as Garupa or Bandori, is a mobile rhythm game developed by Craft Egg and published by Bushiroad for the Android and iOS platforms. Part of Bushiroad's BanG Dream! music franchise, it was released in Japan on March 16, 2017. Overseas launches took place in Hong Kong, Macao, and Taiwan on October 19, 2017, in Korea on February 6, 2018, worldwide in English on April 4, 2018, and mainland China on May 30, 2019. While Bushiroad serves as the publisher for the Japanese- and English-language servers, the traditional Chinese localization (Hong Kong, Macao, Taiwan) is published by Mobimon Inc., whereas bilibili and Kakao Games oversee the mainland Chinese and Korean versions, respectively.
